column1: A Memorial Service will be held on Wednesday (June 24
column2: 2015) at 12:00 Noon at Grace United Church of Christ in Kohler. Rev. Tom Schroeder
column3: pastor of the Church will officiate. Cremation has taken place and Inurnment will be in the Kohler Woodland Cemetery. Visitation will be at the CHURCH on Wednesday Morning from 10:00 A.M. until the time of service.
